name: BestofBollywood
0:
”Alexa open best of Bollywood.”
”Alexa launch best of Bollywood.”
”Alexa ask best of Bollywood to give me a fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: best of bollywood
des: The skill responds with some cool and lesser known facts about the biggest film industry of India - Bollywood. Enable and enjoy these awesome trivia about you favourite actors and movies. Say 'Alexa open Best of Bollywood' and get the best of Bollywood.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
